title: Trump's New Year's Eve party: Who attended the Mar-a-Lago gala?
shortDescription: Donald Trump hosted his annual New Year's Eve party at Mar-a-Lago. Attendees included Elon Musk and JD Vance. Laura Trump got up on stage to sing.

title: At NYE gala, Donald Trump says he'll attend Jimmy Carter funeral in DC
shortDescription: Guests at Trump's New Year's Eve party at Mar-a-Lago included Elon Musk, JD Vance, Ted Cruz, Roger Stone and three of Trump's children.

title: Trump's picks warned on social media posting amid confirmation fights
shortDescription: Susie Wiles, Trump's chief of staff in his next administration, sent a memo to nominees for administration jobs reminding them of social media rules.

title: Who will attend Trump's New Year's Eve gala at Mar-a-Lago?
shortDescription: Donald Trump's annual New Year's Eve gala at Mar-a-Lago on Tuesday evening will have a very different vibe this year - now that he's president-elect.

title: These Republican lawmakers won’t back Mike Johnson for House Speaker
shortDescription: House lawmakers on Friday are set to vote on the speakership amid dissatisfaction from key Republicans over Mike Johnson's leadership.

title: Trump changes tune on Jimmy Carter
shortDescription: Donald Trump mocked Jimmy Carter as worst president in history. But after Carter's death, Trump suggested ex-leader had his 'highest respect.'

title: He oversaw park devoted to Jimmy Carter — and it changed his life
shortDescription: Gary Ingram spent 7 years in Plains, Georgia, supervising the National Park Service site devoted to Jimmy Carter's life. He says it changed his life.

title: The complex history of Joe Biden's decades-long friendship with Jimmy Carter
shortDescription: Joe Biden may have been the first U.S. senator to endorse Jimmy Carter's presidential bid. But that doesn't mean they always saw eye-to-eye.

title: Trump backs Mike Johnson for House Speaker amid GOP doubts
shortDescription: Elon Musk joined Donald Trump in showing support for Mike Johnson ahead of House lawmakers' vote on the speakership.

title: Trump loses sexual abuse appeal in $5 million E. Jean Carroll case
shortDescription: A federal appeals court ruled against President-elect Donald Trump's appeal of a $5 million award to columnist E. Jean Carroll.
